items.title: How the Trump family is poised to profit from a $2 billion Middle East crypto deal that uses their stablecoin
items.description: The transaction has prompted Democrats to reverse course on bipartisan stablecoin legislation.

items.title: Deepfakes gave AI a bad rap but the tech has real uses—it just needs guardrails, experts say
items.description: AI leaders have a “duty” to make sure the technology is used in a responsible way, said Daniel Hulme, CEO of Satalia.

items.title: Disney is building a new theme park and resort in Abu Dhabi
items.description: UAE park will be the seventh Disney theme park resort worldwide.

items.title: Amazon is rolling out a robot with a sense of touch—but it won’t replace humans, the company says
items.description: Amazon Robotics' chief technologist, Tye Brady, wants to "eliminate" every mundane task faced by humans.

items.title: A group of anonymous traders scored a $100 million payday by buying Melania Trump’s memecoin just before it launched publicly
items.description: $MELANIA is down 98% from its peak of $133.73 on the day after its public launch.
